Package com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Implementation.NameService

Class Summary
JNS We have access to *all* attributes at this level, e.g., java.home Therefore, we can use this format to impose structure on the environment variables, and use the object name, e.g., if the object name is foobar, then we can scan for all attributes with the format foobar.
JNSSetup This class is essentially responsible for adding the JNS implementation to the inventory.
PNS A naming service implementation based on Java Properties.
PNSSetup This class is essentially responsible for adding the PNS implementation to the inventory.
